title: What is OLED? A complete guide to the iPhone X's new screen | Trusted Reviews
description: ![]()Just like with LG televisions, Samsung’s dominance of phone-sized OLED panelsmeant that the Korean firm was able to offer AMOLED screens on its smartphonesfor years. That’s partly why Samsung has offered OLED for ages, while Applehas stuck with less impressive display alternatives.Here are a few recent phones that feature OLED screens:  * iPhone X  * [Samsung Galaxy S8](https://www.trustedreviews.com/reviews/samsung-galaxy-s8)  * [Samsung Galaxy S8+](https://www.trustedreviews.com/reviews/samsung-galaxy-s8-plus)  * [Samsung Galaxy Note 8](https://www.trustedreviews.com/reviews/samsung-galaxy-note-8)  * [OnePlus 5](https://www.trustedreviews.com/reviews/oneplus-5)  * [LG V30](https://www.trustedreviews.com/reviews/lg-v30)  * YotaPhone 3  * Meizu Pro 7  * Motorola Moto Z2 Force Edition  * Vivo X9sHowever, giving the increasing availability and cheapness of OLED panels, we’dexpect this list to grow very quickly, very soon.**Related:[Best Android phones](https://www.trustedreviews.com/guide/best-android-phones-1)****Which smartphone that you’ve used had the best screen? Let us know viaFacebook or Twitter.**
